legendaryGroup.name: Captain Ashbeak
lairActions: When fighting inside its lair, the iago ashbeak can invoke the ambient magic to take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the iago ashbeak can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects:

legendaryGroup.name: Captain Ashbeak
regionalEffects: The Heartmeister imbues its vessel with magic that creates one or more of the following effects:

items: The vessel always stays on course to the destination the Heartmeister names.
The vessel doesn't sink even if its hull is breached

regionalEffects: If Captain Ashbeak dies, these effects fade over the course of 1d6 hours.
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties) while captaining a vessel, the Heartmeister can take one of the following lair actions; it can't take the same lair action two rounds in a row:

items: The air within 60 feet of the vessel is filled with wind. Until initiative count 20 on the next round, that area is difficult terrain, and when a Medium or smaller creature flies into that area or starts its turn flying there, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
A strong wind propels the vessel, increasing its speed by 30 feet until initiative count 20 on the next round.

vehicle.name: The Howling Knave

trait.name: Defiant Sails
entries: These sails glitter with a fine coat of mithral treated with abjuration magic. While the sails are unfurled, ranged weapon attacks made against the ship and anyone aboard it are made with disadvantage, as a result of the sails' protective magic. This drawback doesn't apply if the attacker is aboard the ship.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of its sails, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.
45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

weapon.name: Ballista
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) piercing damage.

weapon.name: Mangonel
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) bludgeoning damage.

action: On its turn, the Howling Knave can take 3 actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only 2 actions if it has fewer than twenty crew and only 1 action if it has fewer than ten. It can't take these actions if it has fewer than three crew.

items.name: Fire Ballista
items.entry: The Howling Knave can fire its {@object ballista} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Fire Mangonel
items.entry: The Howling Knave can fire its {@object mangonel} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Move
items.entry: The Howling Knave can use its helm to move with its sails.

vehicle.name: The Abyssal Pillager

trait.name: Death Vessel
entries: Crafted with materials harvested from the Shadowfell, this upgrade grants a ship an aura of dread. As an action, the ship can create a pulse of horrific energy. Every creature that is an enemy of the ship who is on board or within 210 feet of it must make DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is {@condition frightened} of the ship for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this ability for 24 hours. Once this ability is used, it can't be used again until {@dice 1d4} hours have passed.

trait.name: Bones of Endless Toil
entries: The bones of ancient, mysterious creatures festoon the ship. Potent runes crawl across these remains, emitting a sickly green radiance. When a humanoid dies aboard the ship, that creature must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, it dies as normal. If it fails, it immediately rises as a {@creature zombie} obedient to the ship's captain. The zombie gains a working knowledge of the ship, allowing it to serve as a member of the crew. A number of creatures equal to the ship's creature capacity can be animated in this manner at any given time.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the Abyssal Pillager can't turn.
20 ft. (requires at least 20 crew)
35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) piercing damage.

weapon.name: Mangonels
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) bludgeoning damage.

weapon.name: Naval Ram
entries: The Abyssal Pillager has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object. Any damage it takes from the crash is applied to the naval ram rather than to the ship. These benefits don't apply if another vessel crashes into the Abyssal Pillager.

action: On its turn, the Abyssal Pillager can take 3 actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only 2 actions if it has fewer than twenty crew and only 1 action if it has fewer than ten. It can't take these actions if it has fewer than three crew.

items.name: Fire Ballistas
items.entry: The Abyssal Pillager can fire its {@object ballista||ballistas} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Fire Mangonels
items.entry: The Abyssal Pillager can fire its {@object mangonel||mangonels} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Move
items.entry: The Abyssal Pillager can use its helm to move with its oars or sails. As part of this move, it can use its naval ram.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The armor is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the armor must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save {@dc or} fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

trait.name: Split Form
entries: When the armor health drops below {@b 33} hit points, the armor splits into a set of {@creature Animated Armor|MM} with {@b 17} hit points, a {@creature Flying Shield|MPSOURCE} with {@b 13} hit points and a {@creature Flying Sword|MM} with {@b 9} hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The armor makes two attacks with its longsword, then uses its shield bash.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed a {@dc 14} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Alchemical Savant
entries: Whenever Daz'vol casts a spell using their {@item alchemist's supplies} as the spellcasting focus, that restores hit points or deals acid, fire, necrotic, or poison damage, they gain a {@b +4} bonus.

trait.name: Restorative Reagents
entries: Whenever Daz'vol drinks an {@i experimental elixir} they gain 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) temporary hit points.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Daz'vol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, while leaving their hands free.

trait.name: Spell-Storing Item (8 Charges)
entries: Daz'vol can expend a charge and cast {@spell cure wounds} at 1st level.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: Daz'vol has the following flaws:

items.name: {@i Forbiddence}
items.entry: Daz'vol can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

items.name: {@i Harmed by Running Water}
items.entry: Daz'vol takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.

items.name: {@i Stake to the Heart}
items.entry: Daz'vol is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place.

items.name: {@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity}
items.entry: Daz'vol takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Daz'vol is a 13th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The Daz'vol has the following artificer spells prepared:
footerEntries: *spell that heals or deals acid, fire, necrotic, or poison damage

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Daz'vol's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}). The Daz'vol can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Repeating Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Vampire Bite (5/Long Rest)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target isn't a Construct or an Undead, Daz'vol empowers himself in one of the following ways:

items: Regain hit points equal to the damage dealt by the bite.
Gain a bonus equal to the damage dealt, to the next ability check or attack roll they make.

reaction.name: Flash of Genius (4/Long Rest)
entries: When Daz'vol makes an ability check or a saving throw, they can add {@b +4} to the roll.

reaction.name: Mind Sharpener (4 Charges; Recharges 1d4 a Day)
entries: Whenever Daz'vol fails a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell, they succeed instead, expending 1 charge.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The shield is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the shield must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save {@dc or} fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the shield remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal shield.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed a {@dc 11} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The Vampire Bat can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The Vampire Bat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:

items.name: {@spell Forbiddance}
items.entry: The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

items.name: {@i Harmed by Running Water}
items.entry: The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.

items.name: {@i Stake to the Heart}
items.entry: The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place.

items.name: {@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity}
items.entry: The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: Vampire Bats don't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 ({@damage 1d6}) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies and is reborn as a vampire.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The Vampire Rat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Vampire Rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Vampire Rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the Vampire Rat to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a {@dc of} 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the Vampire Rat drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:

items.name: {@spell Forbiddance}
items.entry: The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

items.name: {@i Harmed by Running Water}
items.entry: The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.

items.name: {@i Stake to the Heart}
items.entry: The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place.

items.name: {@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity}
items.entry: The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 ({@damage 1d6}) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies and is reborn as a vampire.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The zrider has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the zrider to sleep.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The zrider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the zrider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zrider to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a {@dc of} 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zrider drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The zrider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The zrider's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). The zrider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The zrider is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The zrider has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zrider makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Blessed Disciples
entries: When the {@i Surgical Combat Anti-Lethal Physiology Examination Liasonn} casts a healing spell on another creature, they both regain HP equal to 2 + the spell's level.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Mace, +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) radiant damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) radiant damage.

monster.name: Carrion, The Guardian Devil

trait.name: Ultimate Blast
entries: When Carrion casts {@spell eldritch blast}, the spell gets a +5 damage bonus and the target can be pushed up to 10 feet away in a straight line.

trait.name: Staff of Fire
entries: The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, Carrion can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, with a spell save {@dc 20}: {@spell burning hands} (1 charge), {@spell fireball} (3 charges), or {@i {@b wall of fire}} (4 charges).
The staff regains 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) expended charges daily at dawn. If Carrion expends the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff blackens, crumbles into cinders, and is destroyed.

trait.name: Artillerist
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on Carrion's ranged attack rolls.

trait.name: Dark One's Blessing
entries: When reducing a hostile creature to 0 HP, Carrion gains {@b 21} temp HP.

trait.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When making an ability check or a saving throw, Carrion can add 5 ({@damage 1d10}) to the roll.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Carrion's darkvision.

trait.name: Eldritch Mind
entries: Carrion has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on a spell.

trait.name: Hurl Through Hell (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When hitting a creature with an attack, Carrion can instantly transport the target through the lower planes. At the end of Carrion's next turn, the target returns to the space it previously occupied, or the nearest unoccupied space. If the target is not a fiend, it takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Pyromancer
entries: Spells cast by Carrion ignore resistance to fire damage.

items: When rolling fire damage, any 1's can be rerolled, but the new rolls must be uses, but if it is another 1, it is treated as a 2.

Whenever Carrion cast a spell that deals fire damage, surround Carrion until the end of their next turn. While the flames are present, any creature within 5 feet of Carrion that hits them with a melee attack takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Carrion's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). They can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Carrion is a 16th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). Carrion has the following warlock spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Ritual Casting
headerEntries: Carrion's ritual spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). The spells can be cast at will, taking 10 minutes longer to cast than normal:

action.name: Staff of Fire
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

legendaryHeader: Carrion, The Guardian Devil can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. They regain spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The Carrion casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Staff of Fire (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: If Carrion has {@b {@i Investiture of Flame is Active}} active, this only Costs 1 Action.
Carrion makes an attack with the {@b {@i Staff of Fire}}.

legendary.name: Summon Flame (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: If {@b {@i Investiture of Flame}} is active, Carrion creates a 15 foot line in a direction they choose. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, takin 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The hoard can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the hoard can move through any opening large enough for a Medium humanoid. The hoard can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Brutalize
entries: If the hoard starts its turn in the same space as an {@condition unconscious} creature that is Huge or smaller, the creature dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hoard makes a various stabs attack in all creatures in its space.

action.name: Various Stabs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the lunatics space. {@h}30 ({@damage 7d8 - 1}) piercing damage, or 16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) piercing damage if the hoard has half of its hit points or fewer. If the target is a creature, the target is wounded. At the start of each of the wounded creature's turns, it takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage for each time it's been wounded, and it can then make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, ending the effect of all such wounds on itself on a success. Alternatively, the wounded creature, or a creature within 5 feet of it, can use an action to make a {@dc 15} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check, ending the effect of such wounds on it on a success

monster.name: Witherling Horde
languages: Understands Gnoll but does not speak it

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The Horde can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the Horde can move through any opening large enough for a medium humanoid. The Horde can only regain hit points through its {@b {@i Endless Meat}} ability. The Horde cannot gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Discarded Impedance
entries: If the Horde takes {@b 30} damage in one turn, an area within it's space becomes difficult terrain for other creatures. The area can be up to 10 feet on a side. If the Horde has half of its hit points or fewer, the area is reduced to 5 feet on a side.

trait.name: Endless Meat (1/Turn)
entries: The Horde can contaminate the remains of a large or smaller creature within its space, and gain 10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) hit points. The creature must be medium or smaller creature if the Horde has half of its hit points or fewer. If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points within the Horde's space, the Horde can use this ability without expending a use.

trait.name: Unmanageable Size
entries: If the Horde has more than half of its hit points, it has advantage on Strength saving throws, and disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Horde makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its club, or two with its club.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the Horde's space. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage if the Horde has half of its hit points or fewer. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Clubs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the Horde's space. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if the Horde has half of its hit points or fewer.

bonus.name: Rampage
entries: When the Horde reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the Horde can move up to half its speed and make a bites attack.

reaction.name: Vengeful Strike
entries: In response to a gnoll being reduced to 0 hit points within 30 feet of the Horde, it makes a melee attack. If the gnoll was within the Horde, it makes 2 attacks.

trait.name: Divine Smite
entries: When Bernlack hits with a melee weapon attack, they can expend one spell slot to deal 9 ({@damage 2d8}) extra radiant damage to the target plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) for each spell level higher than 1st and and additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) against undead or fiends.

trait.name: Great Weapon Fighting
entries: Bernlack can reroll a 1 or 2 once on a damage die for an attack made two hands.

trait.name: Divine Health
entries: Bernlack is immune to disease.

trait.name: Slasher
entries: When Bernlack scores a critical hit that deals slashing damage to a creature, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls until the start of Bernlack's next turn.

trait.name: Gift of the Ever-Living Ones
entries: Whenever Bernlack regains hit points while within 100 feet of their familiar, any dice rolled to regain hit points is treated as having rolled their maximum value.

trait.name: Voice of the Chain Master
entries: Bernlack can communicate telepathically with his familiar, perceive through its senses, and speak through it in his own voice.

trait.name: Stone of Good Luck
entries: Bernlack has a {@b +1} bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Bernlack is a 8th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Bernlack has the following warlock and paladin spells prepared:
footerEntries: Bernlack regains up to two 2nd level spell slots on a Short Rest.

spellcasting.name: Ritual Casting
headerEntries: Bernlack's ritual spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The spells can be cast at will, taking 10 minutes longer to cast than normal:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Bernlack makes two attacks.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage. The target's speed is reduced by 10ft. until the start of Bernlack's next turn.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage. The target's speed is reduced by 10ft. until the start of Bernlack's next turn.

action.name: Channel Divinity (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Bernlack uses their Channel Divinity in one of the following ways.

items.name: {@b Nature's Wrath}
items.entry: Bernlack causes vines to erupt and force a creature within 10 feet to make a {@dc 14} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (their choice) or becomes {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. The restrained creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: {@b Turn the Faithless}
items.entry: Each fey and fiend within 30 feet of Bernlack must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature spends its turns moving as far away from Bernlack as it can, can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of Bernlack, take reactions, and only take the dash action, escape from an effect that prevents it from moving, or take the Dodge action if there's nowhere to move.

action.name: Fey Presence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Bernlack causes each creature in a 10-foot cube to make a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} until the end of his next turn.

action.name: Lay on Hands Pool (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Bernlack has a pool of healing power that can restore {@b 25} HP. Bernlack can touch a creature to restore any number of HP remaining in the pool, or 5 HP to either cure a disease or neutralize a poison affecting the creature.

action.name: Divine Sense (6/Long Rest)
entries: Until the end of Bernlack's next turn, they can sense anything affected by the hallow spell or know the location of any celestial, fiend, undead within 60 ft. that is not behind total cover.

reaction.name: Guardian Emblem (3/day)
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of Bernlack suffers a critical hit they can turn the critical hit into a normal hit instead.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If its saving throw result is 5 or lower, the {@condition poisoned} target falls {@condition unconscious} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Heart Sight
entries: Dixie touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state. If the target fails a {@dc 10} Charisma saving throw, Dixie also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: Dixie magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment Dixie wears or carries is invisible with it.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Elaine deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Elaine doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Elaine is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Elaine instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Actor
entries: Elaine has advantage on Charisma ({@skill Deception}) and Charisma ({@skill Performance}) checks made to hide his identity.

trait.name: Mage Hand Legerdemain
entries: When Elaine casts {@spell mage hand}, they can make the spectral hand {@condition invisible}. They can also perform the following additional tasks unnoticed by succeeding on a Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check contested by a creature's Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check:

items: Stow one object the hand is holding in a container worn or carried by another creature.
Retrieve an object in a container worn or carried by another creature.
Use thieves' tools to pick locks and disarm traps at range.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Elaine is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The Elaine has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Rapier, +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Change Appearance
entries: Elaine can change their appearance and voice. They determine the specifics of the changes and can adjust their height and weight, but must remain medium sized.
They stay in this new form until they uses an action to revert to their true form or until they die.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Elaine can take the following actions: Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Controls their {@spell mage hand}.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: Elaine can halve the damage from an attack against them if they can see the attacker.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Gil deals an extra 13 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Gil can take the following as actions: Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

bonus.name: Master of Tactics
entries: Gil can use the Help action. When using the Help action to aid an ally in attacking a creature, the target of that attack can be within 30

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When Gil is hit by an attack when he can see the attacker, he can halve the attack's damage against.

trait.name: Keen Mind
entries: Hana always knows which way is north, how many hours left before the next sunrise or sunset, and can accurately recall anything they have seen or heard within the past month.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Hana is an 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Hana has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Minor Conjuration
entries: Hana conjures an inanimate object smaller than 3 feet on a side that weighs less than 10 pounds. The object radiates dim light out to 5 feet and disappears after 1 hour, when they use this feature again, or if it takes any damage.

bonus.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher is cast)
entries: Hana teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see. If it instead chooses a space within range that is occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature, they both teleport, swapping places.

trait.name: Manifest Mind - Cast Spell (3/Long Rest)
entries: When casting a wizard spell, Parry can cast it from the spectral tome's space.

trait.name: Manifest Mind - One with the Word
entries: The Parry has advantage on all Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) checks.

trait.name: Arcane Recovery (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When finishing a short rest, the Parry can recover expended spell slots - up to a combined level of {@b 4}, and none of the slots can be 6th level or higher.

trait.name: Awakened Spellbook
entries: When casting a spell, Parry can replace its damage type with the damage type done by another spell of the same level.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: When Parry rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, they can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Parry has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Parry can move through the space of any creature that is medium or larger.

trait.name: Stout Resilience
entries: Parry has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Parry is a 8th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability for wizard spells is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The Parry has the following wizard spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Ritual Casting
headerEntries: Parry's ritual spellcasting ability for wizard spells is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The spells can be cast at will, taking 10 minutes longer to cast than normal:

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Manifest Mind (Recharges after a Long Rest; or a Spell Slot is spent to use it)
entries: A Tiny spectral tome hovers in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Parry. It sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius and disappears if it is 300 feet away from them. While manifested, the tome can hear and see, has 60 ft. of darkvision and can telepathically share with Parry what it sees and hears (no action required).
As a bonus action, the tome to hover up to 30 feet. It can pass through creatures but not objects.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny construct. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Skeletonize
entries: If the swarm starts its turn in the same space as a dead creature that is Huge or smaller, the corpse is destroyed, leaving behind only equipment and bones (or exoskeleton).

trait.name: Scale Dust
entries: The swarm releases magical glittering dust from its wings. Each creature that moves within the swarm's space is covered in is dust and becomes outlined in blue light. While outlined in this way, a creature sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius, has disadvantage of stealth checks, can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}, and attacks targeting the creature are made at advantage. Using an action to remove the dust on the creature ends the effect on it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swarm makes a ravenous bite attacks in all creatures in its space

action.name: Ravenous Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}24 ({@damage 6d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. If the target is a creature, scarabs burrow into its body, and the creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. Any creature can use an action to kill or remove the scarabs with fire or a weapon that deals piercing damage, causing 1 damage of the appropriate type to the target. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by the swarm's piercing damage dies. A creature damaged by the swarm must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or contract a disease.
At the start of the diseased creature, roll a d6 to determine the disease's effect:

items.name: {@b 1-2}
items.entry: The creature's walking speed decreases by 10ft. Any additional movement speeds the creature has are halved.

items.name: {@b 3-4}
items.entry: The creature takes an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage each turn and it's hit point maximum decreases by that value. The reduction lasts until the disease ends.

items.name: {@b 5-6}
items.entry: The creature has a -2 penalty to ability checks and attack rolls.

entries: The disease lasts until the scarabs are removed from the creature.

trait.name: Divine Smite
entries: When Bernlack hits with a melee weapon attack, they can expend one spell slot to deal 9 ({@damage 2d8}) extra radiant damage to the target plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) for each spell level higher than 1st and and additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) against undead or fiends.

trait.name: Great Weapon Fighting
entries: Bernlack can reroll a 1 or 2 once on a damage die for an attack made two hands.

trait.name: Divine Health
entries: Bernlack is immune to disease.

trait.name: Slasher
entries: When Bernlack scores a critical hit that deals slashing damage to a creature, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls until the start of Bernlack's next turn.

trait.name: Gift of the Ever-Living Ones
entries: Whenever Bernlack regains hit points while within 100 feet of their familiar, any dice rolled to regain hit points is treated as having rolled their maximum value.

trait.name: Stone of Good Luck
entries: Bernlack has a {@b +1} bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

trait.name: Aura of Protection
entries: Bernlack grants all friendly creatures within 10 ft. a +3 bonus to all saving throws.

trait.name: Aura of Warding
entries: Friendly creatures within 10 feet of Bernlack have resistance to damage from spells.

trait.name: Voice of the Chain Master
entries: Bernlack can communicate telepathically with his familiar, perceive through its senses, and speak through it in his own voice.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Bernlack is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Bernlack has the following warlock and paladin spells prepared:
footerEntries: Bernlack regains up to two 2nd level spell slots on a Short Rest.

spellcasting.name: Ritual Casting
headerEntries: Bernlack's ritual spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The spells can be cast at will, taking 10 minutes longer to cast than normal:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Bernlack makes two attacks.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage. The target's speed is reduced by 10ft. until the start of Bernlack's next turn.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage. The target's speed is reduced by 10ft. until the start of Bernlack's next turn.

action.name: Channel Divinity (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Bernlack uses their Channel Divinity in one of the following ways.

items.name: {@b Nature's Wrath}
items.entry: Bernlack causes vines to erupt and force a creature within 10 feet to make a {@dc 15} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (their choice) or becomes {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. The restrained creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: {@b Turn the Faithless}
items.entry: Each fey and fiend within 30 feet of Bernlack must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature spends its turns moving as far away from Bernlack as it can, can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of Bernlack, take reactions, and only take the dash action, escape from an effect that prevents it from moving, or take the Dodge action if there's nowhere to move.

action.name: Fey Presence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Bernlack causes each creature in a 10-foot cube to make a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} until the end of his next turn.

action.name: Lay on Hands Pool (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Bernlack has a pool of healing power that can restore {@b 25} HP. Bernlack can touch a creature to restore any number of HP remaining in the pool, or 5 HP to either cure a disease or neutralize a poison affecting the creature.

action.name: Divine Sense (6/Long Rest)
entries: Until the end of Bernlack's next turn, they can sense anything affected by the hallow spell or know the location of any celestial, fiend, undead within 60 ft. that is not behind total cover.

reaction.name: Guardian Emblem (3/day)
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of Bernlack suffers a critical hit they can turn the critical hit into a normal hit instead.

entries: Mart can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: Davos has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

If the target is a creature, the first mate can choose to deal no damage with the attack to disarm the target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding on the ground.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The deep diver has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Brine Lurker
entries: Alok has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while submerged in water.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: Alok can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Lure
entries: Alok can cause his lure to light up or darken at will. While the lure is lit, he sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius centered on itself and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: Alok can magically command any shark within 120 feet, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Alok makes two attacks with his glaive, or one attack with his bite and two with his claws.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Light of Sekolah
entries: The deep diver pulses magical light from its lure. Any creature within 30 feet of the deep diver that can see the light must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the end of its next turn. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way is {@condition incapacitated} as it stares at the light.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Arcane Burst

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Shortsword, +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) piercing damage {@i {16 ({@damage 1d6 + 13}) with {@b bladesong}}}.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage  {@i {13 ({@damage 1d4 + 11}) with {@b bladesong}}}.

bonus.name: Bladesong (5/Long Rest)
entries: The Accursed can to start the Bladesong, which gives them the following benefits for 1 minute:

items: The Accursed gains a {@b +5} bonus to their AC.
The Accursed's walking speed increases by 10 feet.
The Accursed has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) checks.
The Accursed gains a {@b +5} bonus to any concentration checks.

reaction.name: Song of Defense
entries: When the Accursed takes damage while their {@b {@i bladesong}} is active, they can expend one spell slot the reduce that damage they take by 5 * the spell slot's level.

reaction.name: War Caster
entries: When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack from the Accursed, they can use cast a spell at the creature, rather than making an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature.

monster.name: Hurricane
languages: Understands Auran but does not speak it

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The Storm can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The Storm doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Living Storm
entries: The Storm is 3 ({@damage 1d6}) * 100 feet in diameter. Heavy precipitation in the form of either rain or snow falls there, causing the area to be lightly obscured. Heavy rain also extinguishes open flames and imposes disadvantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.
In addition, strong winds swirl in the area covered by the storm. The winds impose disadvantage on ranged attack rolls. The winds extinguish open flames and disperse fog

action.name: Water Jet
entries: The storm magically shoots water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 5 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a target takes half the bludgeoning damage, but is neither pushed nor knocked prone.

action.name: Whelm {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also knocked {@condition prone}. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.

action.name: Freezing Strikes {@recharge 5}
entries: The Storm launches 3 ice spikes: +7 to hit, 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the this turn.

action.name: Tidal Breath {@recharge 6}
entries: The Storm unleashes a wave of frigid seawater in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) bludgeoning damage and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) cold damage, and is pushed 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

trait.name: Oceanic Soul
entries: When you are fully submerged any creature that is also fully submerged can understand your speech and you can understand theirs.

trait.name: Agonizing Blast
entries: When Captain Ashbeak hits a creature with {@spell eldritch blast}, each damage roll gets a +4 bonus.

trait.name: Lance of Lethargy (1/Turn)
entries: When Captain Ashbeak hits a creature with your {@spell eldritch blast}, that creature's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of your next turn.

trait.name: Repelling Blast
entries: When Captain Ashbeak hits a creature with your {@spell eldritch blast}, that creature's speed can be pushed up to 10 feet away from you in a straight line.

trait.name: Expert Duplication
entries: Captain Ashbeak has advantage on any ability checks to produce an exact duplicate of writing or craftwork.

trait.name: Kenku Recall (3/Long Rest
entries: Captain Ashbeak can give himself when he makes a skill check he has proficiency in.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Captain Ashbeak can accurately mimic sounds and voices he has heard. A creature can tell they are imitations only with a successful {@dc 15} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

trait.name: Gift of the Sea
entries: Captain Ashbeak can breathe underwater.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Captain Ashbeak is a 6th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). Captain Ashbeak has the following warlock spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rod of the Pact Keeper (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Captain Ashbeak regains one warlock spell slot.

bonus.name: Tentacle of the Deeps (3/Long Rest)
entries: Captain Ashbeak creates a 10-foot-long tentacle at a point within 60 feet and the tentacle lasts for 1 minute. When creating the tentacle, Captain Ashbeak can make a melee spell attack against one creature within 10 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
On subsequent turns while the tentacle is active, Captain Ashbeak can move it 30 ft. and make the attack again.

reaction.name: Guardian Coil
entries: While Captain Ashbeak's {@b {@i Tentacle of the Deeps}} is active and he sees a creature take damage while within 10 feet of the tentacle, it can reduce the damage to that creature by 4 ({@damage 1d8}).

monster.name: Iago, The Heartmeister
languages: Infernal but does not speak it

trait.name: Gift of the Sea
entries: Captain Ashbeak can breathe underwater.

trait.name: Grasping Tentacles
entries: Whenever Captain Ashbeak casts {@spell evard's black tentacles} they gain {@b 10} temporary hit points.

trait.name: Eldritch Mind
entries: Captain Ashbeak has advantage on Constitution saving throws they make to maintain concentration on a spell.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Captain Ashbeak is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Captain Ashbeak has the following warlock spells prepared:

headerEntries: The Heartmeister's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Dagger

When creating the tentacle, Captain Ashbeak can make a melee spell attack against one creature within 10 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of Captain Ashbeak's next turn.
On subsequent turns while the tentacle is active, Captain Ashbeak can move it 30 ft. and make the attack again.

trait.name: Actor
entries: Le Capitaine has advantage on Charisma ({@skill Deception}) and Charisma ({@skill Performance}) checks made to hide his identity.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Gift of the Depths
entries: Le Capitaine can breathe underwater.

trait.name: Repelling Blast
entries: When Le Capitaine hits a creature with eldritch blast, he can push the creature up to 10 feet away from him in a straight line

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Le Capitaine's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Le Capitaine is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Le Capitaine has the following warlock spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Change Appearance
entries: Le Capitaine can change his appearance and voice. He determine the specifics of the changes and can adjust his height and weight, but must remain medium sized.
He stays in this new form until he uses an action to revert to his true form or until he die.

action.name: Command Familiar
entries: Le Capitaine's familiar makes one Attack of its own with its Reaction.

action.name: Fey Presence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Le Capitaine causes each creature in a 10-foot cube to make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} until the end of his next turn.

action.name: Rod of the Pact Keeper (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Le Capitaine regains one warlock spell slot.

bonus.name: Investment of the Chain Master
entries: Le Capitaine can command his familiar to take the Attack action.

reaction.name: Beguiling Defenses
entries: When another creature attempts to charm Le Capitaine he can force them to make a 16 {@dc Wisdom} saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute or until the creature takes any damage.

reaction.name: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: In response to taking damage, Le Capitaine turns {@condition invisible} and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. He remains invisible until the start of his next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

reaction.name: Protect Familiar
entries: When Le Capitaine's familiar takes damage, it instead has resistance to that damage.

reaction.name: Shape Up, Ye Dog (2/Day)
entries: Whenever a friendly creature within 30 feet of Le Capitaine that can hear him misses with an attack, Le Capitaine can yell perilous threats to allow that creature to reroll the attack roll.

trait.name: Gunner
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on Parrot Paul's ranged attack rolls.

trait.name: Land's Stride
entries: The Parrot Paul can move through nonmagical difficult terrain and nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them. The Parrot Paul has advantage on saving throws against plants that are magically created or manipulated to impede movement.

trait.name: Natural Explorer
entries: When Parrot Paul makes an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to Forests and the Coast, Parrot Paul's proficiency bonus is doubled.

trait.name: Gathered Swarm (1/Turn)
entries: Immediately when Parrot Paul hits a creature with an attack, his swarm helps him in one of the following ways:

items: The attack's target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage from the swarm.
The attack's target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be moved by the swarm up to 15 feet.

trait.name: Favored Foe (3/Long Rest)
entries: When Parrot Paul hits a creature with an attack roll, they can mark the target as their favored enemy for 1 minute or until they lose concentration. The first time Parrot Paul hits their favored enemy on each of their turns the hut does an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Parrot Paul is a 6-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The Parrot Paul has the following ranger spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Parrot Paul makes two attacks.

action.name: Pistol, +1
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rapier, +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Primeval Awareness
entries: Parrot Paul can expend one spell slot to focus his awareness for 1 minute per level of the spell slot. Parrot Paul can sense whether the following types of creatures are present within 1 mile: aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.
This range expands up to 6 miles when in forests or the coast.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Smitty Werbenjagermanjensen can take one additional action on their turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Glacier can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Combat Superiority (4d8/Long Rest)
entries: Glacier can use the following abilities:

items.name: {@i {@b Trip Attack}}
items.entry: When Glacier hits with a weapon attack they add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll. They can force a Large or smaller target to succeed a 15 {@dc Strength} saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

items.name: {@i {@b Disarming Attack}}
items.entry: When Glacier hits with a weapon attack they add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll. They can force the target to succeed a 15 {@dc Strength} saving throw or drop the object Glacier choose. The object lands at its feet.

items.name: {@i {@b Goading Attack}}
items.entry: When Glacier hits with a weapon attack they add the superiority die to the attack's damage roll. They can force the target to succeed a 15 {@dc Wisdom} saving throw or the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls against targets other than Glacier until the end of his next turn.

trait.name: Tavern Brawler
entries: The Glacier has proficiency with improvised weapons. The damage die and type of an improvised weapon are determined by the DM. Thrown improvised weapons does 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) damage with range 20/60 ft.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Glacier's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Glacier makes two attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Antimatter Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 120/360 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d8 + 1}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

bonus.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The Glacier can to regain 11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) HP.

bonus.name: Tavern Brawler
entries: When the Glacier hits a creature with an unarmed strike or an improvised weapon he can attempt to grapple the target.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Wickie can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Emissary of the Sea
entries: Winslow can communicate simple ideas to any Beast, Elemental, or Monstrosity with a swimming speed.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Wickie's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 10}, {@hit 2} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Wickie is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The Wickie has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Dafoe's Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Channel Divinity (2/Short Rest)
entries: The Wickie uses their Channel Divinity in one of the following ways.

items.name: {@b Radiance of the Dawn}
items.entry: All magical darkness within 30ft of Winslow is dispelled. Each hostile creature within 30 feet of the Wickie must succeed a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) radiant damage or take half damage on a failed save.

items.name: {@b Turn Undead}
items.entry: Each undead within 30 feet of the Wickie must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature spends its turns moving as far away from the Wickie as it can, can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of the Wickie, take reactions, and only take the dash action, escape from an effect that prevents it from moving, or take the Dodge action if there's nowhere to move. When an undead of CR {@b 3} or lower fails its saving throw, the creature is instantly destroyed.

reaction.name: Warding Flare (3/Long Rest)
entries: When a creature is attacked by another creature that cannot be {@condition blinded} within 30 feet of Winslow, he can impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
